entry.title: Amethyst Exfoliating Body Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: Herbivore Botanicals
Type: Body Scrub
Price: 44.00

Reveal silky smooth skin with the Crystal Queen of Calmness. Gently exfoliating and purely magical, crushed Amethyst Gemstone combines with magnesium-rich salt, ultra-hydrating Organic Virgin Coconut Oil and night-blooming Jasmine Sambac to lavish your body with luxe moisture. Meet your new royal treatment.

• Truly Natural | Vegan | Cruelty-Free

• Herbivore products contain no synthetic ingredients — this includes no dyes, no fragrances, and no synthetic preservatives. Additionally, they are concentrated blends containing no fillers and using the minimum amount of ingredients necessary to achieve the maximum results.

• 6.6 oz | 200 g glass jar

Ingredients

Sucrose (Sugar), Magnesium Sulfate (Epsom Salt), Cocos Nucifera (Virgin Coconut) Oil, Capric Triglycerides, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Kaolinite, Amethyst Powder, Jasminum Sambac (Jasmine), Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract (and) Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract (and) Amino Esters-1 (ex Mimosa Tenuiflora) (and) Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract (and) Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract (and) Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract (and) Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract (and) Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract (and) Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract (and) Corallina Officinalis Extract.

Directions

Directions: Massage a handful of body polish into the skin. Let sit for a minute or two for complete hydration. Rinse off.

Caution: May make bathtub/shower floor slippery. To keep the body polish fresh, please keep water out of the jar and store in a dry place when not in use.

entry.title: Holy Yoni

Vendor: Moon Juice
Type: Feminine Care
Price: 48.00

ADAPTOGENIC YONI OIL

Holy Yoni is an adaptogenic blend of Schisandra Berry Extract, Bulgarian Rose Oil, Vitamin E and Sweet Almond Oil.

• Schisandra Berry Extract helps to improve skin elasticity while providing antioxidant protection

• Bulgarian Rose Essential Oil has an arousing scent and soothes skin.

• Vitamin E hydrates skin and is rich in antioxidants

Apply 3 drops topically. Use for passion, pleasure and daily maintenance!

entry.title: Cell-Power Hand Treatment
entry.summary:
Vendor: Medical Beauty Research
Type: Hand Cream
Price: 109.00

“Exceptional Smoothing Protector” 

An intensely nourishing hand care and protection treatment. Deeply hydrating components balance the skin’s moisture content and increase the ability to retain moisture. The skin’s surface structure is noticeably improved, while deeply replenishing the lipid barrier. With gentle lightening properties, Cell-Power Hand Treatment relieves hyperpigmentation caused by factors such as age, hormonal changes and sun exposure. Pigments are balanced and regulated, preventing further darkening.

• Well suited for even the most dry, sensitive and irritated skin.

• Protects and rebuilds lipid barrier

• Smoothes skin’s surface structure and maintains resilience

• Lightens areas of hyperpigmentation, balances pigmentation

• Prevents emergence of new pigmentation spots

• Balances moisture content and increases ability to retain moisture

- 100 ml | 3.4 oz

- *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Olive Oil, Shea Butter, Urea, Apricot Kernel Oil, Avocado Oil, Meadowfoam Oil, Allantoin, Pentavitin®, Kalpariane®, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Beta-White™.

Directions

Use daily as needed. Apply Cell-Power Hand Treatment by gently massaging it in.

entry.title: Orange Blossom Ylang Bang Body Butter
entry.summary:
Vendor: LILFOX
Type: Body Butter
Price: 80.00

Indulge in the sensual floral and citrus aromatics with a synergy of neroli, bitter orange, and ylang ylang. Nourishing mango and shea butters are blended with tropical oils of coconut and Brazilian maracuja to deliver a daily intensive deep moisturizing treatment.

• Formulated with 99.34% Certified Organic ingredients

• Formulated without parabens, synthetic fragrances, sodium sulfates

• 6.76 oz | 200 ml

Ingredients

Shea Butter */**, Mango Butter*, C.nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, P.incarnata (Maracuja Seed) Oil*, S.chinensis (Jojoba) Wax*, Tocopherols (vit.E/non-gmo), Essential Oil Blend Including, Neroli + Ylang Yang* + Bitter Orange*. *Organic, **Fair-Trade

Directions

During warm weather the lightly whipped and fluffy texture of this may settle during shipping. If it underwent a temperature increase, it may look like the jar is not full, but it has merely settled, and the net weight has not changed. The texture may be a little more dense but it's still skin softening and absolutely luscious for your skin.

entry.title: Green Vetiver Deodorant Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: LILFOX
Type: Deodorant
Price: 26.00

A sensual blend of aromatic green vetiver, frankincense, and green mandarin blended into skin nourishing organic babbasu and maracuja. Earthy yet sexy and luxurious. A unisex essential oil blend that is long lasting and ultra effective. Will leave you smelling oh so fresh into the wee hours.

• Formulated without parabens, synthetic fragrances, sodium sulfates

• 1.7 oz | 50 ml

Ingredients

Orbignya oleifera (Babassu) Seed Butter*, Sodium Bicarbonate (Baking Soda), Maranta arundinacea (Arrowroot) Root Powder*, Euphorbia cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Passiflora edulis (Maracuja) Oil*, Brassica campestris (Rapeseed) Oil*, Rosmarinus officinialis (Rosemary) Oil*, Proprietary Essential Oil Blend Including Vetiveria zizanoide (Vetiver) Oil*, Citrus riticulata (Green Mandarin) Oil. *Certifed Organic

Directions

entry.title: Hand Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Olio E Osso
Type: Hand Cream
Price: 25.00

An exceptionally rich, nourishing hand cream that hydrates and soothes. Made without lanolin, using moisturizing shea butter and natural oils that protects skin, this cream gives hands a long-lasting, velvety smooth feel.

• 2 oz | 57 g

• Made by hand in small batches in Portland, Oregon

Ingredients

Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Nut Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Maranta Arundinacea (Arrowroot) Root Powder, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium (Neroli) Flower Oil, Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Gum Resin Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Farnesol.

Directions

Use pointed end of cap to puncture tube opening. Expect hand cream to be stiff upon initial use due to its nutrient dense quality. A little goes a long way! Simply smooth a small amount of cream all over hands (or elbows, knees, heels or anywhere else needing attention) and allow time for it to absorb into skin.

entry.title: Moroccan Beldi Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kahina Giving Beauty
Type: Body Wash
Price: 38.00 - 46.00 (3 variants)

Moroccan Beldi Soap is a traditional cleansing and skin softening treatment direct from the Moroccan hammam. Naturally rich in Vitamin E, the gel-like soap can be used for cleansing or as a body masque to soften skin prior to exfoliating with the Kahina Kessa Mitt. Beldi means “traditional” or “authentic” in Moroccan.

• 8.8 oz | 250 g

Ingredients

Moroccan Rose: saponified organic olive oil, aqua, rosa damascena essential oil.

Neroli: saponified olive oil, water, citrus aurantium amara (neroli) flower oil.

Eucalyptus: saponified olea europaea (olive) oil, eucalyptus globulus (eucalyptus) leaf oil.

Directions

To cleanse: Massage a tablespoon of savon noir onto skin or washcloth in bath or shower and rinse off. For skin cleansing and softening: After 5-10 minutes in bath, shower, or steam, massage into skin and leave on for up to 10 minutes before rinsing with warm water. Skin will be softened and ready for exfoliating with mitt, glove, washcloth, or konjac sponge. For best results, use Kahina Giving Beauty Moroccan kessa glove. May also be used for simple cleansing as a deliciously scented soap replacement.

entry.title: Essaouira Body Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kahina Giving Beauty
Type: Body Oil
Price: 98.00

A moisturizing body oil rich in Vitamin E to replenish and restore dry skin and scented with a blend of pure steam distilled essential oils, Essaouira Body Serum is a fresh, crisp fragrance combining sophisticated floral notes with a hint of the exotic. Rose, lavender, herbaceous geranium and woodsy sandalwood provide a soft floral scent while petitgrain lifts and brightens. We love this lighter scent for spring and summer.

• 6.7 fl oz | 200 ml

• Kahina Giving Beauty products are made with premium quality, certified organic argan oil and other antioxidant-rich byproducts of the argan tree. The argan nuts are cracked by hand using centuries-old techniques by Berber women in Morocco’s argan region. The oil is then cold-pressed using modern methods that preserve the integrity of the oil.

Ingredients

argania spinosa (argan) oil*, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, olea europaea (olive) fruit oil*, caprylic/capric triglyceride, ocos nucifera (coconut) nut oil*, citrullus lanatus (watermelon) seed oil, pelargonium graveolens (geranium) leaf/flower oil*, rosa damascena (rose) flower oil*, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower oil*, santalum spicatum (sandalwood) wood oil, tanacetum annuum flower oil*, citrus aurantium (petitgrain bigarade) leaf/bud oil, bisabolol, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*. *Ingredient from Organic Farming, 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin; 97.51% of the total ingredients are from Organic Farming.

Directions

Apply as needed to body and hands. For best results, massage into damp skin after bath or shower. Recommended especially after body exfoliation using Kahina Beldi Soap and Kessa Glove.

entry.title: Renew - Coconut Body Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pursoma
Type: Body Scrub
Price: 17.00

Slough away dull, dry, and dead skin to reveal glowing softness. The RENEW body polish instantly repairs rough spots and skin texture. Pursoma's farm partners in Jamaica provide fresh harvested coconuts, and on the northern coast of France they source raw Grey sea salt. Gentle exfoliation from these natural exfoliants delivers a dose of serious rejuvenation with added oils that moisturize, so you’ll feel refreshed, renewed and totally transformed.

• detoxifying + exfoliating

• polishing + smoothing

• moisturizing + rejuvenating

• 4 oz | 113 g

- 1 Bag = 1 Resurfacing Treatment

- Non-GMO, SLS, Paraben & Dye-Free. BPA-Free, Pthalate-Free, Gluten-Free. Vegan & Cruelty-Free.

- Made in the USA

Ingredients

sodium chloride (sea salt), carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed powder, cocos nucifera (coconut oil and powder), simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, hydrolyzed avena sativa (oat), hydrolyzed quinoa, tapioca starch, cocos nucifera (coconut husk), tocopherol (vitamin e). Oryza sativa (rice bran) oil.

Directions

DIGITAL WELLNESS begins here by putting your devices on airplane mode. BLEND the contents of the oil sachet into the scrub mixture. Mix well. SCRUB your body while still dry before turning shower on. Begin at your shoulders, working your way down to your feet applying the scrub in circular motions. Use the entire contents of the package to exfoliate anywhere you can reach. ACTIVATE the hydration phase. Apply small amounts of water in a circular motion, scrubbing the skin as you go. RINSE completely without soap or body cleanser.

Not intended for medicinal use. Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Contains iodine. If you are pregnant or have a medical condition consult your physician before use.

entry.title: BeRejuvenated Bubble Elixir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bathorium
Type: Bath Oil
Price: 36.00

PINE, CEDARWOOD, & SPEARMINT BUBBLE BATH OIL

Powerful deep penetrating bubble elixir to ease your entire body and aid in muscle recovery. Fresh pine and cedarwood essential oils calm the entire body and allow for full muscle restoration.

Green, clean and natural bubble bath formulated without the use of harsh surfactants and detergents. Frothy long-lasting bubbles that elevate your bath time to the next level.

250 ml ELIXIR bottle will run approx 10-12 baths

500 ml ELIXIR bottle will run approx 24 baths

Ingredients

Organic Arnica Infusion (Arnica Montana and Aqua)*, Coco Betaine, Coco Glucoside, Sea Salt (Sodium Chloride), Gluconodeltalactone (and) Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Citrate, Organic Pine Needle Oil (Pinus Sylvestris)*, Organic Fir Needle Oil (Abies Balsamea)*, Organic Cedarwood Oil (Cedrus Deodora)*, Organic Spearmint Oil (Mentha Spicata)*, Organic Coriander Seed Oil (Coriandrum Sativum)*, Oakmoss Absolute (Evernia Prunastri)*, Organic chlorophyll Extract*. *certified organic

Directions

Fill the tub with warm water. Add 2-3 TBSP of Elixir under running water. Get in, you've earned it.

Matcha green tea has ancient sought out properties that naturally detoxify the skin’s outer layer and helps retain moisture throughout the day. entry.title: Pre-Shave Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Olio E Osso
Type: Shave Oil
Price: 35.00

Shaving creams don’t always prevent razor nicks, ingrown hairs or skin irritations. That’s why we developed Pre-Shave Oil to protect your skin during your shave, and for days afterward.

• Made by hand in small batches in Portland, Oregon

• 2 fl oz | 60 ml

Ingredients

Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Cedrus Deodara (Cedarwood) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil.

Directions

Smooth as much as needed on to clean skin, shave and rinse.

entry.title: Lustero Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Olio E Osso
Type: Body Oil
Price: 60.00

This body oil is as nourishing and versatile as it is beautiful. Leaving your skin smooth and glowing, it was designed to even out and enhance all skin tones. With a scent reminiscent of the best summer evenings, Lustero Bronzing Oil is rich and warm with hints of citrus and earthy spice. Lustero contains a golden shimmer that settles to the bottom allowing you to shake as much luster into the oil as you like.

• Made by hand in small batches in Portland, Oregon

• 4 fl oz | 120 ml

Ingredients

Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Peel Oil, Mica (and) Titanium Dioxide (and) Iron Oxide (CI 77019), Litsea Cubeba (Litsea) Fruit Oil, Annatto (CI 5120), Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Shrub Oil, Cedrus Deodara (Cedarwood) Wood Oil.

Directions

Use as a clear oil or shake to mix in shimmer to add more luster. Apply after bath or shower while skin is still moist or use to enhance sun-kissed skin.

entry.title: SmartBody Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: EVOLVh
Type: Body Wash
Price: 24.00

An amazing sulfate-free moisturizing cleansing foam that is concentrated and long lasting, and is healthier for our planet after going down the drain. It's nothing short of a luxurious win-win for all.

Provides gentle cleansing while infusing essential nutrients to leave skin moisturized, smooth, soft and radiant.

• Vegan & gluten free

• Silicone free, paraben free, panthenol free, phthalate/musk free, petroleum/mineral oil free

• Never tested on animals

• Made in the USA

• 8.5 fl oz | 250 ml

Ingredients

Water, Decyl Glucose‡, Disodium Sulfosuccinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine‡, Lauryl Glucose‡, Coco Polyglucose‡, Kiwi Seed Oil†, Almond Oil*, Seaweed Extract†, Citrus Aurantifolia*, Lecithin*, Sunflower Oil*, Soya, Safflower Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit†, Vegetable Glycerine†, Soy Amino Acids†, Vitamin C‡, Wild Pansy Extract†, Sweet Clover Extract†, Apricot Extract†, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract†, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract†, Aspalathus Linearis Leaf Extract†, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract†, Equisetum Arvense Extract†, Nigella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil†, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil†, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Fruit Extract†, Nasturtium Extract†, Nectarine Extract†, Passion Flower Extract*, Parfumº, Dehydroacetic Acid*, Benzyl Alcohol*.

*ECOCERT Certified Ingredient †Natural Ingredient ‡Plant Derived/Organically Derived, , °Natural Fragrance, Phthalate free/Musk free

Directions

Start with two pumps applied directly to skin or onto your favorite applicator. Savor every rejuvenating moment and rinse. The luxurious foam is very concentrated, and as with all EVOLVh products, less is more.
